verses.verse: כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki When יְרַחֵ֨ם <S%H7355><s%> ye-ra-Chem will have mercy יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For the LORD אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, on Jacob וּבָחַ֥ר <S%H977><s%> u-va-Char and will yet choose עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> 'Od and again בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El, Israel וְהִנִּיחָ֖ם <S%H3240><s%> ve-hin-ni-Cham and set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- their own אַדְמָתָ֑ם <S%H127><s%> 'ad-ma-Tam; them in their own land וְנִלְוָ֤ה <S%H3867><s%> ve-nil-Vah shall be joined הַגֵּר֙ <S%H1616><s%> hag-Ger and the strangers עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, and וְנִסְפְּח֖וּ <S%H5596><s%> ve-nis-pe-Chu with them and they shall cleave עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit to the house יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

וּלְקָח֣וּם <S%H3947><s%> u-le-ka-Chum shall take עַמִּים֮ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim And the people וֶהֱבִיא֣וּם <S%H935><s%> ve-he-vi-'Um them and bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מְקוֹמָם֒ <S%H4725><s%> me-ko-Mam them to their place וְהִֽתְנַחֲל֣וּם <S%H5157><s%> ve-hit-na-cha-Lum shall possess בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- and the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al in אַדְמַ֣ת <S%H127><s%> 'ad-Mat them in the land יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> la-'a-va-Dim for servants וְלִשְׁפָח֑וֹת <S%H8198><s%> ve-lish-fa-Chot; and handmaids וְהָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu will take שֹׁבִ֣ים <S%H7617><s%> sho-Vim and they shall take them captives לְשֹֽׁבֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H7617><s%> le-shoei-Hem, whose captives וְרָד֖וּ <S%H7287><s%> ve-ra-Du they were and they shall rule בְּנֹגְשֵׂיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5065><s%> be-no-ge-sei-Hem. over their oppressors ס sa-Mek

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah, will be in בְּי֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom And it shall come to pass in the day הָנִ֤יחַ <S%H5117><s%> ha-Ni-ach shall give thee rest יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD לְךָ֔ le-Cha, מֵֽעָצְבְּךָ֖ <S%H6090><s%> me-'a-tze-be-Cha from thy sorrow וּמֵרָגְזֶ֑ךָ <S%H7267><s%> u-me-ra-ge-Ze-cha; and from thy fear וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- at הָעֲבֹדָ֥ה <S%H5656><s%> ha-'a-vo-Dah bondage הַקָּשָׁ֖ה <S%H7186><s%> hak-ka-Shah and from the hard אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עֻבַּד־ <S%H5647><s%> 'ub-bad- wherein thou wast made to serve בָּֽךְ׃ Bach.

וְנָשָׂ֜אתָ <S%H5375><s%> ve-na-Sa-ta That thou shalt take up הַמָּשָׁ֥ל <S%H4912><s%> ham-ma-Shal this proverb הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech against the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel of Babylon וְאָמָ֑רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-Ma-re-ta; and say אֵ֚יךְ <S%H349><s%> 'eich How שָׁבַ֣ת <S%H7673><s%> sha-Vat ceased נֹגֵ֔שׂ <S%H5065><s%> no-Ges, How hath the oppressor שָׁבְתָ֖ה <S%H7673><s%> sha-ve-Tah ceased מַדְהֵבָֽה׃ <S%H4062><s%> mad-he-Vah. the golden city

שָׁבַ֥ר <S%H7665><s%> sha-Var hath broken יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh the staff רְשָׁעִ֑ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im; of the wicked שֵׁ֖בֶט <S%H7626><s%> She-vet [and] the sceptre מֹשְׁלִֽים׃ <S%H4910><s%> mo-she-Lim. of the rulers

מַכֶּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> mak-Keh He who smote עַמִּים֙ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim the people בְּעֶבְרָ֔ה <S%H5678><s%> be-'ev-Rah, in wrath מַכַּ֖ת <S%H4347><s%> mak-Kat stroke בִּלְתִּ֣י <S%H1115><s%> bil-Ti because סָרָ֑ה <S%H5627><s%> sa-Rah; continual רֹדֶ֤ה <S%H7287><s%> ro-Deh he that ruled בָאַף֙ <S%H639><s%> va-'Af in anger גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim, the nations מֻרְדָּ֖ף <S%H4783><s%> mur-Daf is persecuted בְּלִ֥י <S%H1097><s%> be-Li [and] none חָשָֽׂךְ׃ <S%H2820><s%> cha-Sach. hindereth

נָ֥חָה <S%H5117><s%> Na-chah is at rest שָׁקְטָ֖ה <S%H8252><s%> sha-ke-Tah [and] is quiet כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; The whole earth פָּצְח֖וּ <S%H6476><s%> pa-tze-Chu they break forth רִנָּֽה׃ <S%H7440><s%> rin-Nah. into singing

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- Even בְּרוֹשִׁ֛ים <S%H1265><s%> be-ro-Shim Yea the fir trees שָׂמְח֥וּ <S%H8055><s%> sa-me-Chu rejoice לְךָ֖ le-Cha אַרְזֵ֣י <S%H730><s%> 'ar-Zei at thee [and] the cedars לְבָנ֑וֹן <S%H3844><s%> le-va-Non; of Lebanon מֵאָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> me-'Az for שָׁכַ֔בְתָּ <S%H7901><s%> sha-Chav-ta, [saying] Since thou art laid down לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no יַעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Leh is come up הַכֹּרֵ֖ת <S%H3772><s%> hak-ko-Ret no feller עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu. against

שְׁא֗וֹל <S%H7585><s%> she-'ol, Hell מִתַּ֛חַת <S%H8478><s%> mit-Ta-chat Thahash רָגְזָ֥ה <S%H7264><s%> ra-ge-Zah from beneath is moved לְךָ֖ le-Cha לִקְרַ֣את <S%H7125><s%> lik-Rat for thee to meet בּוֹאֶ֑ךָ <S%H935><s%> bo-'E-cha; [thee] at thy coming עוֹרֵ֨ר <S%H5782><s%> o-Rer it stirreth up לְךָ֤ le-Cha רְפָאִים֙ <S%H7496><s%> re-fa-'Im the dead כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עַתּ֣וּדֵי <S%H6260><s%> 'at-Tu-dei for thee [even] all the chief ones אָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz, of the earth הֵקִים֙ <S%H6965><s%> he-Kim it hath raised up מִכִּסְאוֹתָ֔ם <S%H3678><s%> mik-kis-'o-Tam, from their thrones כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei all the kings גוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim. of the nations

כֻּלָּ֣ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam will all יַֽעֲנ֔וּ <S%H6030><s%> ya-'a-Nu, All they shall speak וְיֹאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> ve-yo-me-Ru and say אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha; to you גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- Even אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you חֻלֵּ֥יתָ <S%H2470><s%> chul-Lei-ta unto thee Art thou also become weak כָמ֖וֹנוּ <S%H3644><s%> cha-Mo-nu as אֵלֵ֥ינוּ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-nu we נִמְשָֽׁלְתָּ׃ <S%H4911><s%> nim-Shal-ta. as we;art thou become like

הוּרַ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> hu-Rad is brought down שְׁא֛וֹל <S%H7585><s%> she-'ol to the grave גְּאוֹנֶ֖ךָ <S%H1347><s%> ge-'o-Ne-cha Thy pomp הֶמְיַ֣ת <S%H1998><s%> hem-Yat [and] the noise נְבָלֶ֑יךָ <S%H5035><s%> ne-va-Lei-cha; of thy viols תַּחְתֶּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tei-cha beneath יֻצַּ֣ע <S%H3331><s%> yutz-Tza' is spread רִמָּ֔ה <S%H7415><s%> rim-Mah, the worm וּמְכַסֶּ֖יךָ <S%H4374><s%> u-me-chas-Sei-cha cover תּוֹלֵעָֽה׃ <S%H8438><s%> to-le-'Ah. under thee and the worms

אֵ֛יךְ <S%H349><s%> 'eich How נָפַ֥לְתָּ <S%H5307><s%> na-Fal-ta How art thou fallen מִשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> mish-sha-Ma-yim from heaven הֵילֵ֣ל <S%H1966><s%> hei-Lel O Lucifer בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son שָׁ֑חַר <S%H7837><s%> Sha-char; of the dawn נִגְדַּ֣עְתָּ <S%H1438><s%> nig-Da'-ta [how] art thou cut down לָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> la-'A-retz, to the ground חוֹלֵ֖שׁ <S%H2522><s%> cho-Lesh which didst weaken עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and גּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim. the nations

וְאַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you אָמַ֤רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ta For thou hast said בִֽלְבָבְךָ֙ <S%H3824><s%> vil-va-ve-Cha in thine heart הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim into heaven אֶֽעֱלֶ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> 'e-'e-Leh, I will ascend מִמַּ֥עַל <S%H4605><s%> mi-Ma-'al above לְכֽוֹכְבֵי־ <S%H3556><s%> le-choch-vei- the stars אֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> 'el of God אָרִ֣ים <S%H7311><s%> 'a-Rim I will exalt כִּסְאִ֑י <S%H3678><s%> kis-'I; my throne וְאֵשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> ve-'e-Shev I will sit בְּהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> be-har- also upon the mount מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed of the congregation בְּיַרְכְּתֵ֥י <S%H3411><s%> be-yar-ke-Tei in the sides צָפֽוֹן׃ <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fon. of the north

אֶעֱלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> 'e-'e-Leh I will ascend עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above בָּ֣מֳתֵי <S%H1116><s%> Bo-mo-tei above the heights עָ֑ב <S%H5645><s%> 'Av; of the clouds אֶדַּמֶּ֖ה <S%H1819><s%> 'ed-dam-Meh I will be like לְעֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> le-'el-Yon. the most High

אַ֧ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach Nevertheless אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שְׁא֛וֹל <S%H7585><s%> she-'ol to hell תּוּרָ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> tu-Rad Yet thou shalt be brought down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יַרְכְּתֵי־ <S%H3411><s%> yar-ke-tei- to the sides בֽוֹר׃ <S%H953><s%> Vor. of the pit

רֹאֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H7200><s%> ro-'Ei-cha They that see אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha over יַשְׁגִּ֔יחוּ <S%H7688><s%> yash-Gi-chu, thee shall narrowly look אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha over יִתְבּוֹנָ֑נוּ <S%H995><s%> yit-bo-Na-nu; upon thee [and] consider הֲזֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> ha-Zeh you is this הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish thee [saying Is] this the man מַרְגִּ֣יז <S%H7264><s%> mar-Giz to tremble הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, that made the earth מַרְעִ֖ישׁ <S%H7493><s%> mar-'Ish that did shake מַמְלָכֽוֹת׃ <S%H4467><s%> mam-la-Chot. kingdoms

שָׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> sam [That] made תֵּבֵ֛ל <S%H8398><s%> te-Vel the world כַּמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> kam-mid-Bar as a wilderness וְעָרָ֣יו <S%H5892><s%> ve-'a-Rav the cities הָרָ֑ס <S%H2040><s%> ha-Ras; and destroyed אֲסִירָ֖יו <S%H615><s%> 'a-si-Rav his prisoners לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not פָ֥תַח <S%H6605><s%> Fa-tach thereof [that] opened בָּֽיְתָה׃ <S%H1004><s%> Ba-ye-tah. not the house

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei All the kings גוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim of the nations כֻּלָּ֑ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam; All שָׁכְב֥וּ <S%H7901><s%> sha-che-Vu [even] all of them lie בְכָב֖וֹד <S%H3519><s%> ve-cha-Vod in glory אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every one בְּבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-To. in his own house

וְאַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you הָשְׁלַ֤כְתָּ <S%H7993><s%> ha-she-Lach-ta But thou art cast out מִֽקִּבְרְךָ֙ <S%H6913><s%> mik-kiv-re-Cha of thy grave כְּנֵ֣צֶר <S%H5342><s%> ke-Ne-tzer branch נִתְעָ֔ב <S%H8581><s%> nit-'Av, like an abominable לְב֥וּשׁ <S%H3830><s%> le-Vush [and as] the raiment הֲרֻגִ֖ים <S%H2026><s%> ha-ru-Gim of those that are slain מְטֹ֣עֲנֵי <S%H2944><s%> me-To-'a-nei thrust through חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Cha-rev; with a sword יוֹרְדֵ֥י <S%H3381><s%> yor-Dei that go down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> 'av-nei- to the stones ב֖וֹר <S%H953><s%> Vor of the pit כְּפֶ֥גֶר <S%H6297><s%> ke-Fe-ger as a carcase מוּבָֽס׃ <S%H947><s%> mu-Vas. trodden under feet

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not תֵחַ֤ד <S%H3161><s%> te-Chad Thou shalt not be joined אִתָּם֙ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tam in בִּקְבוּרָ֔ה <S%H6900><s%> bik-vu-Rah, with them in burial כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because אַרְצְךָ֥ <S%H776><s%> 'ar-tze-Cha thy land שִׁחַ֖תָּ <S%H7843><s%> shi-Cha-ta because thou hast destroyed עַמְּךָ֣ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha thy people הָרָ֑גְתָּ <S%H2026><s%> ha-Ra-ge-ta; [and] slain לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יִקָּרֵ֥א <S%H7121><s%> yik-ka-Re be renowned לְעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam shall never זֶ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> Ze-ra' the seed מְרֵעִֽים׃ <S%H7489><s%> me-re-'Im. of evildoers

הָכִ֧ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> ha-Chi-nu Prepare לְבָנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> le-va-Nav for his children מַטְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4293><s%> mat-Be-ach slaughter בַּעֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> ba-'a-Von for the iniquity אֲבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tam; of their fathers בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- that they do not יָקֻ֙מוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> ya-Ku-mu rise וְיָ֣רְשׁוּ <S%H3423><s%> ve-Ya-re-shu nor possess אָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz, the land וּמָלְא֥וּ <S%H4390><s%> u-mal-'U nor fill פְנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> fe-nei- the face תֵבֵ֖ל <S%H8398><s%> te-Vel of the world עָרִֽים׃ <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim. cities
